name: Clemente Biondetti
introduction: Clemente Biondetti(August 18, 1898 - February 24, 1955) was an Italian racing driver, who competed in one Formula One race, the 1950 Italian Grand Prix, for Ferrari. This was the only appearance for a Ferrari not powered by a Ferrari engine, but the first of a long history of F1 association for Jaguar. However, engine problems forced Biondetti out of the race.
